title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and market research.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for WorkLifeBalanceOptimizer. The design should include data models (e.g., User, Task, Workload, Work-Life Balance Score), APIs (RESTful and GraphQL where necessary), infrastructure (considering cloud services like AWS or Google Cloud), security considerations (data encryption, user authentication, authorization, and access control), and a robust database design for handling sensitive user data. Integrate machine learning algorithms (Supervised Learning with regression techniques for pattern analysis in work-life balance data). Outline the system's data flow, interactions between various components, and microservices architecture for scalability and flexibility. Also, consider implementing containerization technologies such as Docker for deployment.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, analytics, and other application data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side logic, APIs, and integrations for the application.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and experience for the web and mobile applications.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the application adheres to security best practices and regulatory compliance requirements.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and automation for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for end-users and administrators.
